metadata.name: Process Execution From A Potentially Suspicious Folder
metadata.comment: Detects a potentially suspicious execution from an uncommon folder.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\perflogs\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\users\\all users\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\users\\default\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\users\\networkservice\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\addins\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\debug\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\fonts\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\help\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\ime\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\media\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\repair\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\security\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\system32\\tasks\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower(':\\windows\\tasks\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('$recycle.bin')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\config\\systemprofile\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\intel\\logs\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\rsa\\machinekeys\\'))) AND NOT (startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\users\\public\\ibm\\clientsolutions\\start_programs\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\syswow64\\config\\systemprofile\\citrix\\updaterbinaries\\')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\citrixreceiverupdater.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects a potentially suspicious execution from an uncommon folder.
